### Campaign Notes

## Occupation and History

Xarasâ€™xa is a Dragonborn Artificer living in [Haran](/Atlas/Kandalur/Realms/Arna/Settlements/Haran.md). He has been known to create some of the most sought after magical items in Kandalur. Practice caution when conversing with this Dragonborn, he has little patience for feeble-minded people who waste his time.
